## PopulatableEthersMosaic.stakeUniTokens() method

Stake Uniswap REEF/MEUR LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn MSIC.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersMosaicTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to add to new or existing stake. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |
